name: Appetizers
description: Small dishes served before the main course to stimulate the appetite.

name: Entrees
description: Main courses that form the central part of a meal.

name: Beverages
description: Drinks including hot, cold, and alcoholic options.

name: Desserts
description: Sweet dishes served at the end of a meal.

name: Salads
description: Cold dishes made with vegetables, fruits, or grains, often served with dressing.

name: Soups
description: Liquid-based dishes made with vegetables, meats, or seafood.

name: Breakfast Items
description: Dishes typically served in the morning, such as eggs, pancakes, and toast.

name: Pasta
description: Italian dishes made with noodles and various sauces or ingredients.

name: Pizza
description: Baked flatbreads topped with cheese, sauce, and various toppings.

name: Grilled Items
description: Food cooked on a grill, such as meats, seafood, or vegetables.

name: Vegan Options
description: Plant-based dishes made without any animal products.

name: Gluten-Free Options
description: Dishes made without gluten for those with dietary restrictions.

name: Seafood
description: Dishes made with fish, shellfish, or other seafood.

name: Burgers
description: Sandwiches with a patty and various toppings, often served with fries.

name: Sandwiches
description: Dishes consisting of bread and various fillings, hot or cold.

name: Kids' Meals
description: Smaller portioned dishes designed for children.

name: Snacks
description: Quick, smaller food items meant to be eaten between meals.

name: Sides
description: Accompaniments to the main dish, such as fries, rice, or vegetables.

name: Combo Meals
description: Meal packages combining multiple items, such as a main dish, side, and drink.

name: Specials
description: Limited-time or featured dishes unique to the restaurant.
